instruction_template:
pug MODIFY_CORE
fence
  bone NOT: break crypto primitives
  bone NOT: expose vault secrets
bark changes <- @diff
cali validate(changes)
biz -> approved_changes
  anchor #commit_hash

pug MODIFY_CODIE
fence
  bone NOT: add 13th keyword
  bone NOT: break tree grammar
bark changes <- @diff
biz -> updated_parser
